bill.title: Computer services & other professional services; allow public contracts over $100,000.00 for without competitive bidding.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-53-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase To $100,000.00 The Minimum Amount Of Expenditure Of Funds For Acquisitions Of Computer Equipment And Services For Which Advertising For Competitive Bids Is Required; To Provide That State Agencies And Local Governing Authorities Shall Not Require The Advertising For Or Otherwise Requesting Competitive Bids To Enter Into Contracts For Any Professional Services Where The Amount Of The Contract Involves The Expenditure Of Public Funds Exceeding $100,000.00, And Those Contracts May Be Negotiated Directly Between The Agency Or Governing Authority And The Providers Of The Professional Services; And For Related Purposes.
